cheatsheet.title: Creation of Side by Side Chart Listing Report

intro.description: This tutorial helps you create a side by side chart listing inside a BIRT report

item.title: Create a DataSource
item.description: Open the Data Explorer View. Right click on Data Sources and choose "New Data Source"

item.title: Create a DataSet
item.description: Open the Data Explorer View. Right click on Data Sets and choose "New Data Set"

item.title: Bind the data to the list
item.description:
- Select the list element in the layout editor
- Go to property editor view
- Select the Binding tab
- Select the data set that you want to bind to the list
- Set data set parameter values if the data set contains parameter

item.title: Edit the list group
item.description: Select the list, right click and choose "Edit Group".

item.title: Edit the chart
item.description: Double click on the chart to edit its properties

item.title: Edit the table
item.description: Drag the fields you need in the group from data explorer view to the table.
